Our Story

2007

We first met as a Junior and an Alumnus in High School. We then were both involved in Scout and OSIS Events.


2008

We met again as Freshman and Senior students in ITB. Just like how I (Yessica) fall in love with Bandung, I am in love with this man too. On October 26th, we promised to build a relationship.

2009

I (Yessica) left Bandung and moved to Depok, UI.

New campus, new life. With this event, we understand how hard it is to be in a Long Distance Relationship. We eventually knew that we only need 2 things: TRUST and COMMUNICATION.


2010 - 2013

Liya moved to Bekasi for work. Good bye LDR !! We can finally meet every weekend.


2014

Feb 1st 2014, we were engaged.

Oct 18th 2014, we will promise to live our life together till death do us part.
